nodes.text: Calrissian Enterprises, formerly Vylar Tech, was a company that specialized in producing droids based in Cloud City on Bespin that was led by Impresario Lando Calrissian. Following the Battle of Endor, Calrissian Enterprises was responsible for a large percentage of all the droids in Cloud City. The Solo family's kitchen droid BX-778 was produced by them, and because he was a household unit they imbued him with personality.
